title: Requires motor vehicle repair shops to provide written notice to customers that an insurance company cannot require a person to use a specific repair shop
summary: Requires motor vehicle repair shops to provide written notice to customers that an insurance company cannot require a person to use a specific repair shop.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring motor vehicle repair shops to provide written notice to customers; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring insurers to disclose financial interests in motor vehicle repair shops
